itemDescription: English rugby league footballer and coach

wikipedia_page.main:
David Griffiths started coaching in 1998 having been injured playing Rugby Sevens in Hong Kong [1] (1997).
He contributed initially to developing youth rugby union and rugby league, coaching the NLD representative sides (2000/2002). He returned to professional rugby, coaching at Hull Kingston Rovers (2002/2005) Bradford Bulls (2006/2007) Doncaster (2008/2009) and the CRFA(2015 - 2021). 
Voluntary coaching positions include Director of RL Deutschland(2005–2010) & SRU National Selector (2013 - 2015).
